long_description: Say ahhh! The Sun WildLight LED carabiner light is fun and functional with a bright LED light that shines right out of the colorful animal's mouth! These fun little lights are great gifts and a world of fun for both young and old. Squeeze the back of either a polar bear, panda, T-rex, Springer Spaniel or Retriever to open the mouth up and shine a bright LED light. Grippy, rubberized finish is airbrushed with bright and vibrant colors. Carabiner clip (non-load-bearing) attaches conveniently to backpacks, key rings, belt loops and much more. The Sun WildLight LED carabiner light operates on 3 replaceable LR1120 lithium batteries. Not intended for climbing or load-bearing use.
